nodes.text: Swoop and Dive is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force adventure Cloak and Vibroblade. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on May 6, 2004 and took the form of an interview by Yara Grugara of podracing legend Kerd K'Kerren who was visiting the Cularin system in pursuit of sponsorship by the Metatheran Cartel.
